mapper.select: SELECT addrcode, addrname FROM addrMiddle WHERE addrcode LIKE CONCAT(#{lcode},'%')

SELECT bno, board.writer, type.tname as type, board.title, board.contents, board.price, board.state, date_format(write_date, '%Y/%c/%d') as write_date, board.view_cnt , addrmiddle.addrname FROM board INNER JOIN type on board.type = type.tcode RIGHT OUTER JOIN addrmiddle ON board.addrcode = addrmiddle.addrcode WHERE type LIKE CONCAT(1,'%') or type in ("101" , "102") LIMIT 1 , 15
